name: Union College Web Technology Group
tagline: Exploring web technologies at Union College in Lincoln, Nebraska.
body:
Welcome!

The Web Technology Group is a collaboration between students and faculty/staff at Union College who are interested in the web and web development. This group includes students in both the computing and graphic design programs, as well as computing faculty and staff members in information technology.

The goal of this collaboration is to make awesome stuff and have fun doing it.

Now what?

We are in the early days of this collaboration, but we are sharing resources and ideas on the wiki and asking questions and getting feedback on the issue tracker.

Get Involved

If you are a student or faculty/staff member at Union College and would like to get involved, email Gary Dickerson (@gadicker) or Ben Barber (@barberboy) and we'll add you to the Github organization (once you have a Github account.

If you are a web professional and interested in collaborating/mentoring, we'd love for you to participate as well. Contribute code, join the discussion, add to the wiki; or send an email to Gary or Ben and we'll find a way for you to be more involved.

Thanks!

Thanks again for stopping by, and please let us know if you have an questions or feedback.

Sincerely,

@gadicker and @barberboy
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
